fulltext:
According to the recruitment announcement of your company, I hereby summarize my 
personal profile, education and career history. 
Personal profile 
Full name: Le To Thanh Tu 
Date of birth: 25/5/1990 
Present address: 86B Hung Vuong Street, ward 9, district 5, Ho Chi Minh city 
Mobile phone number: 0938744492 - 0967421539 
Email: thanhtu250590@gmail.com 
Education History 
08/ 2017 : I finished The Algorithm Course at Big-O. 
01/ 2017 : I finished The React Native Course at Khoa Pham Training.  
The year of 2016 : I finished The Data Engineer Course at Grokking. 
The year of 2015 : I finished The Python Course at Pymivn. 
The year of 2014: I finished The IOS Programming SWIFT Language by Khoa Phạm 
Training. 
The year of 2013: I finished The SEO Training Course by Trí Tuệ Việt Company. 
The year of 2012: I graduated and got bachelor degree in Management Information 
System, Finance Marketing University. 
The year of 2008: I graduated in Luong The Vinh high school. 
Career objective 
• Learning experience, knowledge, skills and desire to work in the professional 
environment. 
• Have an opportunity to acquire knowledge of building mobile applications (IOS), 
improve the ability of programming. 
• Have a passion to become good manager and be successful in other positions. 
Career history 
From November 2017 to present: Project Manager at Flow Technology Group 
Responsibilities: 
• Build Mobile Application using React Native. 
• Build Web API for Mobile App using Django Rest Framework. 
• Build website based on Django Web Framework. 
• Communication with customer to clarify requirements. 
• Propose technology stack for specific project. 
• Design database model structure from requirements. 
• Estimate working man hours per project. 
• Review junior developer's code, merge request. 
• Update and Complete daily tasks of project that was assigned to. 
• Learn new technology, self-implement and help team member to implement new 
technology. 
• Teach python basic. 
From April 2016 to October 2017 : Senior React Native and PHP developer of Ringier 
Viet Nam 
Responsibilities: 
• Build Mobile Application using React Native. 
• Build Hybrid Mobile Application using Ionic2. 
• Build Web API for Mobile App using Laravel. 
• Build website based on HTML version using CMS or Wordpress framework 
implemented MVC pattern. 
• Build hybrid mobile application using ionic2. 
• Build HTML version based on the PSD design. 
• Build new functions of projects using PHP. 
• Update and Complete daily tasks of project that was assigned to. 
• Build more functions for e-com website such as: cronjob to export data to excel 
file from wordpress database, build shortcode for specific promotion campaign. 
From November 2015 to March 2016: PHP developer of HoangPhucInternational 
company. 
Responsibilities: 
• Build website based on HTML version using CMS or Wordpress framework. 
• Build HTML version based on the PSD design. 
• Build new functions of projects using PHP. 
• Update and Complete daily tasks of project that was assigned to. 
• Maintain the e-commerce website of HoangPhucInternational. 
• Build more functions for e-com website such as: export, import data from excel 
file to wordpress database, build discount rules applied for specific promotion 
campaign. 
From March 2015 to October 2015: PHP and IOS developer of Dinoenterprise 
company. 
Responsibilities: 
• Build website based on HTML version using CMS or PHP framework. 
• Build HTML version based on the PSD design. 
• Build server-side API for IOS application using PHP. 
• Build new functions of projects using PHP. 
• Update and Complete daily tasks of project that was assigned to. 
• Update customer’s requests of old projects using CMS. 
• Making researches and solutions on complex problems and requests from 
customer. 
• Prepare Technical document for project. 
From December 2014 to February 2015: Analyst and support for Project Manager of 
Taka company. 
Responsibilities: 
• Analyze customer's requests and compose functions checklist. 
• Analyze and compose additional functions checklist. 
• Analyze cost of functions. 
• Test using website as end user, compare end product with final design, test 
working of functions. 
• Compose User guide and training customer to use website. 
• Create mockup for project. 
• Contact and confirm customer with functions checklist, versions of design,... 
• Create timeline for each project with specific deadlines. 
• Create slide show introduce products and services of Taka by power point and 
prezi. 
• Compose website design contracts. 
• Receive changing request from customer and categorize them by simple, normal 
and hard. Confirm if they are in scope of work. 
• Making changes if they were simple and normal requests. 
• Forward requests to developer if they were hard or additional functions. 
• Follow and report working process to Project Manager and customers. 
• Follow payment process. Composing and sending payment requests to customers. 
From July 2013 to November 2014: SEO employee of Taka company. 
Responsibility: 
• Building SEO system based on Pyramid model for website www.ima.edu.vn. 
• Update post and optimize to search engine for website www.ima.edu.vn. 
• Building satellite pages for website www.ima.edu.vn. 
• Building backlinks for satellite pages. 
Soft Skills: 
• Time management and personal work management skill. 
• English communication skill. 
• English reading and comprehending skill. 
• Teamwork skill. 
• Team management skill. 
• Office skills (Word, excel, internet, ..). 
• Organizing skill. 
• Consultancy skill. 
• Planning, Executing, Reporting skill. 
• Hosting meeting skill. 
Related- job knowledge: 
• Build Mobile Application using React Native 
• Write Unit Test using Jest 
• Using Git or SVN 
• Javascript ES6 
• PHP , Wordpress CMS 
• IOS Programming using SWIFT language 
• MySQL database server 
• Team working experiences 
• SEO knowledge 
• Ionic 2, angularjs2 
• MVC pattern 
• HTML5, CSS3, JQuery 
• Object Oriental Programming 
Advantages in personal qualities: independent, honest, responsible, enthusiastic, 
friendly, eager to learn and very quick learners. 
Referees: 
Bùi Tấn Đạt ( Project Manager of Ringier ) mobile phone : 0989 467685 
Tran Tuan Ninh (Digital Manager of HoangPhucInternational) mobile phone: 
0909722866 
Pham Vu Duy Cuong (Project Manager of Dinoenterprise) mobile phone:01217444416 
Nguyen Hoai Trung (Director of Taka Corp.) mobile phone:0907848484. 
Cao Tan Loc (Director of Anh Phat Corp.) mobile phone:0903846041 
Desire: fair working environment, good judgment on ability, reasonable salary, stable 
job for working in the long run. 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
